retrofit

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrofit.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Endpoint
    Deprecated. 
    Use Endpoints.newFixedEndpoint(java.lang.String). This class will be removed in version 1.5.

    @Deprecated
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements Endpoint
    Represents an API endpoint URL and associated name. Callers should always consult the instance for the latest values rather than caching the returned values.
    Author:
    Bob Lee (bob@squareup.com)
